message.body: How risky is it to get your girlfriend sneakers for christmas ?
I don't really understand the question
I bought Eden sneakers for christmas. I'm wondering If that's weird.
Also I have a picture I want your opinion
That's not weird but does she like sneakers?
Well she never wears sneakers. But she knows I like sneakers on girls and said she really wants to find a pair that we both would like (black high tops with white gums)
So here they are:
They're so tiny and cute haha
They are cute but that's not all you're getting her right?
No whYv
*why?

Just making sure bec a gift should be something she likes not something you like bec it can come off as you wanting to change her... but if its only one item and you got her other things its not a big deal
Yeah that's what I was afraid of. I told her she doesn't have to wear something for me but she said she would like them too. I don't know what else to get her yet
The only thing with getting a girl a shoe is whether or not she has an outfit to go with it. If she doesn't wear sneakers, her current wardrobe might not do causing her to not wear them
Well I have two other small things that don't really count
Right. Though I like the style of sneakers with anything

Ok that's fine. Just tell her that if she doesn't like em she can return them. Most likely she won't but as long as you let her know that its not a pressure way of giving her something you like. Ya know? Like a psychological way of gift giving lol
Yeah totally haha if she doesn't like them she can definitely rerun them. She can always use footwear and their from Steve madden
Ok its fine in my opinion.
Okay thanks. And did you get dads gift? How much do I owe you?
Yea it actually came in today! And we didn't work out who owes what yet. Its whatever you wanna put towards it
Okay but how much was it and how many are splitting?
It was $223... split by all 5 of us
Okay
